name: Robowars (itch) (GAMEINC20)
description: There’s evil and kindness in this world just the relationship between these robots. Bancroft is a good robot that holds a grudge with the evil robot named Brodrick. In a mission to avenge his family and friends, he needed to find Brodrick and kill him. But it’s not that easy since they both have their own power and strength. However, they still have weaknesses. But the problem is Brodrick’s weaknesses are hard to find. Bancroft has to find Brodrick’s weaknesses before the evil robot beats him in order to save his country and get his revenge.
